pageDescription: Stay updated with the latest news, events, and achievements from MUET ORIC

newsItems.title: TECHNICAL SESSION ON GEOTHERMAL ENERGY
newsItems.excerpt: A Technical Session on Geothermal Energy was organized at the Science & Technology Park...
newsItems.content: A comprehensive technical session on Geothermal Energy was organized at the Science & Technology Park, highlighting the potential of renewable energy sources in Pakistan. The session featured expert speakers from various universities and industry professionals discussing the latest developments in geothermal energy technology.
newsItems.author: ORIC Team

newsItems.title: ENGRO Corporation Recruitment Drive
newsItems.excerpt: ENGRO Corporation conducted a recruitment drive at Mehran University...
newsItems.content: ENGRO Corporation successfully conducted a recruitment drive at Mehran University, offering excellent career opportunities for our graduates. The event saw participation from students across various engineering disciplines.
newsItems.author: Career Services

newsItems.title: BitsPro Paid Internship Program
newsItems.excerpt: BitsPro is organizing a recruitment drive for fresh graduates in collaboration with ORIC...
newsItems.content: BitsPro, in collaboration with ORIC, is organizing a comprehensive internship program for fresh graduates, providing hands-on experience in software development and technology solutions.
newsItems.author: Industry Relations

newsItems.title: MUET CAREER FAIR 2025
newsItems.excerpt: The MUET Career Fair, organized by ORIC at Mehran University...
newsItems.content: The annual MUET Career Fair 2025, organized by ORIC, brought together leading companies and talented students, facilitating career opportunities and industry connections.
newsItems.author: Event Management

newsItems.title: MUET Excellence Award 2024
newsItems.excerpt: MUET receives recognition for outstanding contributions to engineering education...
newsItems.content: Mehran University of Engineering and Technology has been recognized with the Excellence Award 2024 for its outstanding contributions to engineering education and research innovation.
newsItems.author: University Administration
